feature.label: Markdown Editor
feature.description:
Support for editing the text-markup language Markdown. Also provides some nice enhancements to the text editor.

Markdown Features: - Content outline - Section folding - Export to HTML and HTML Preview

General Text Features: - Word wrapping - TODO task tags - Format paragraph command The download includes all source code and project files.
